mapper.select: select inquiry.status as status, count(*) as totalCount from ope_customer_inquiry inquiry where inquiry.dr = 0 group by inquiry.status
select count(opi.id) from ope_customer_inquiry opi left join ope_customer oc on opi.customer_id = oc.id and oc.dr = 0 left join ope_parts_product opp on opi.product_id = opp.id and opp.dr = 0
mapper.sql: opi.id, opi.order_no as orderNo, opi.status, IFNULL(OPI.pay_status, '1') as payStatus, oc.customer_full_name as customerFullName, oc.email, opi.product_model as productModel, opp.en_name as enName, opp.color, case when (opp.color = 1) then 'RED' when (opp.color = 2) then 'BLUE' when (opp.color = 3) then 'CHAMPAGNE' when (opp.color = 4) then 'CARBON' when (opp.color = 5) then 'BLACK' end as colorName, case when (opp.color = 1) then '#BB404A' when (opp.color = 2) then '#4C7DB7' when (opp.color = 3) then '#C4B792' when (opp.color = 4) then '#A9AAAC' when (opp.color = 5) then '#000000' end as colorValue, ifnull(opi.def5, 'false') as labelFlag, case when ifnull(opi.def6, '0') = '0' then true else false end as warnFlag, opi.scooter_quantity as qty, opi.total_price as amount, opi.amount_paid as paid, opi.amount_discount as amountDiscount, opi.amount_obligation as balance, opi.created_time as createdTime

opi.id, opi.order_no as orderNo, opi.status, IFNULL(OPI.pay_status, '1') as payStatus, oc.customer_full_name as customerFullName, oc.email, opi.product_model as productModel, opp.en_name as enName, opp.color, case when (opp.color = 1) then 'RED' when (opp.color = 2) then 'BLUE' when (opp.color = 3) then 'CHAMPAGNE' when (opp.color = 4) then 'CARBON' when (opp.color = 5) then 'BLACK' end as colorName, case when (opp.color = 1) then '#BB404A' when (opp.color = 2) then '#4C7DB7' when (opp.color = 3) then '#C4B792' when (opp.color = 4) then '#A9AAAC' when (opp.color = 5) then '#000000' end as colorValue, opi.scooter_quantity as qty, ocib.product_qty as batteryQty, opi.total_price as amount, opi.amount_paid as paid, opi.amount_obligation as balance, opi.amount_discount as discount, oc.country_code as countryCode, oc.telephone, opi.def1 as country, opi.def2 as city, opi.def3 as postcode, opi.address, opi.created_time as createdTime, opi.prepaid_deposit
mapper.select:
select
from ope_customer_inquiry opi left join ope_customer oc on opi.customer_id = oc.id and oc.dr = 0 left join ope_parts_product opp on opi.product_id = opp.id and opp.dr = 0 left join ope_customer_inquiry_b ocib on opi.id = ocib.inquiry_id and ocib.dr = 0 where opi.dr = 0 and opi.id = #{id} limit 1

select DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m') as times ,count(created_time) as total from ope_customer_inquiry where dr = 0 and (DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{start}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m')) GROUP BY times

select DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as times ,count(created_time) as total from ope_customer_inquiry where dr = 0 and (DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(#{start}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY times

select DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %h') as times ,count(created_time) as total from ope_customer_inquiry where dr = 0 and (DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY times
